Package org.objectstyle.cayenne.validation

Interface Summary
ValidationFailure Definea a single failure during the validation process.
 

Class Summary
BeanValidationFailure ValidationFailure implementation that described a failure of a single named property of a Java Bean object.
SimpleValidationFailure Represents a generic validation failure that contains failed object and a message describing the failure.
ValidationResult Represents a result of a validation execution.
 

Exception Summary
ValidationException An exception thrown on unsuccessful validation.
